warezcdn.name: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken
warezcdn.title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

imdb.title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
imdb.plot: Average 37-year-old Minami Satoru dies and is reincarnated as the most unremarkable creature imaginable-a slime.

episodes.title: Veldora's Journal
episodes.plot: Inside of Rimuru's stomach, the Storm Dragon Veldora and the Great Spirit Ifrit pass the time by playing a game of shogi while they recap everything that has happened since a strange slime appeared in their world.

episodes.title: OVA 2: The Tragedy of M?
episodes.plot: Rimuru gets tired of Shion and Shuna fighting over him all the time and decides to create beanbag-style replicas of himself filled with special sand from a nearby lake. Of course, rumor has it that a monster lives at the bottom.

episodes.title: OVA 1: Hey! Butts!
episodes.plot: Rimuru suddenly realizes that there's nothing to do for recreation in Tempest. He suggests sumo wrestling as a way for everyone to have fun together, and his friends are immediately on board with the idea.

episodes.title: OVA 3: Rimuru's Glamorous Life as a Teacher, Part 1
episodes.plot:

episodes.title: Tales: Veldora's Journal 2
episodes.plot: Despite being stuck in Rimuru's stomach, Veldora recounts recent events to Ifrit

episodes.title: Digression: Hinata Sakaguchi
episodes.plot: Hinata Sakaguchi receives a letter from a merchant, recalling a story about the Jura Tempest Federation, a kingdom of monsters.

episodes.title: Rimuru's Busy Day
episodes.plot: Rimuru is preparing for diplomatic relations with the country ruled by the Demon Lord Carrion. He was ready to welcome the embassy from Eurazania, but what showed up was a spectacular-looking tigercart carried by giant Thunder Tigers.

episodes.title: Trade with the Animal Kingdom
episodes.plot: The negotiations between Tempest and Eurazania are successful and both countries begin exchanging technologies and establishing trade routes. Some time later, Rimuru pays a visit to Gazel in the Kingdom of Dwargon, unaware that Clayman is preparing another scheme against him and his nation.

episodes.title: Paradise, Once More
episodes.plot: The alliance between Tempest and Dwargon becomes official. Rimuru visits a familiar place.

episodes.title: The Scheming Kingdom of Falmuth
episodes.plot: Rimuru hosts his last class before returning to Tempest. The wizard Myulan becomes a military advisor for Tempest.

episodes.title: Prelude to the Disaster
episodes.plot: Shogo and two companions are sent to Tempest to cause trouble.

episodes.title: The Beauty Makes Her Move
episodes.plot: Rimuru is ambushed after a reunion with his class. Meanwhile, Falmuth's army invades Tempest

episodes.title: Despair
episodes.plot: Rimuru returns to Tempest to find his city ravaged: many of his subjects were killed. Now, he must prepare for another attack.

episodes.title: Hope
episodes.plot: Rimuru learns that Shion and the other victims of the invasion can be resurrected as he must prepare from another invation.

episodes.title: Putting Everything on the Line
episodes.plot: Rimuru reveals that he was he was a human in his past life. Meanwhile, he must simultaneously deal with the impending attack on his nation while trying to revive those that have died.

episodes.title: Megiddo
episodes.plot: The battle for revenge has begun. Benimaru and his trusted companions carry out their respective missions, while Hakurou and his party face Shogo and Kyoya once again. And Rimuru's fury rains down upon the army from Falmuth.

episodes.title: Birth of a Demon Lord
episodes.plot: Rimuru's revenge over the forces of Falmuth continues to unleash.

episodes.title: The Unleashed
episodes.plot: Rimuru has successfully defeated the Falmuth army and protected Tempest, but there's still a lot of problem at hand. In the middle of that, Raphael comes with news; The Analysis and Assessment of the Unlimited Imprisonment is now complete.

episodes.title: The Visitors
episodes.plot: Veldora is released from the seal by Rimuru. Rimuru and Veldora leaves the cave and returns to the town. They celebrate with a feast at night but has unexpected guests in the morning.

episodes.title: A Meeting of Humans and Monsters
episodes.plot: As prominent figures from several nations assemble in Tempest for a meeting, Laplace and his companions formulate a plan centered around Clayman. Then someone familiar joins the discussion.

episodes.title: Ramiris's Warning
episodes.plot: After a long discussion, diplomatic relations are made between Tempest and the Sorcerous Dynasty of Thalion.

episodes.title: The Congress Dances
episodes.plot: Ramiris tells that Walpurgis is commencing in three days. It is an event where all the demon lords gathers. The agenda for this meeting is Rimuru, the new demon lord.

episodes.title: The Eve of Battle
episodes.plot: Clayman assembles his army to raid the animal kingdom. Rimuru decides to intervene. But Rimuru only has 2 days to move his army to the animal kingdom.

episodes.title: The Demon Lords
episodes.plot: Demon lords from all over the world react to what happened till now and are getting excited for the next Walpurgis.

episodes.title: The Signal to Begin the Banquet
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: On This Land Where It All Happened
episodes.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

episodes.title: Adalman, the Index Finger
episodes.plot: Shuna, Souei, and Hakurou are confronted by Wight King Adalman, who is guarding Clayman's castle. Walpurgis begins.

episodes.title: Walpurgis
episodes.plot: The demon lords' banquet "Walpurgis" begins. Things start to get heated up as Clayman accuses Rimuru with some serious issues in front of the other demon lords.

episodes.title: Returning from the Brink
episodes.plot: Rimuru and Shion face off against Clayman in a deadly battle

episodes.title: Octagram
episodes.plot: Rimuru confers a new name upon the council of Demon Lords after his battle with Clayman.

episodes.title: The Storm Dragon, Veldora
episodes.plot: Mikami Satoru, a businessman, is stabbed by a criminal on the street and killed. When he regains consciousness in the darkness, he finds that he's been reincarnated as a slime.

episodes.title: Meeting the Goblins
episodes.plot: The slime Mikami and the Storm Dragon Veldora decide to give each other names. Veldora gives the slime Mikami the name "Rimuru," and Rimuru comes up with a family name for both of them: "Tempest." Then Rimuru uses his Predator skill to take Veldora into his body and analyze the "Unlimited Imprisonment" seal in hopes of breaking it - but this action sends a shock through the nations surrounding the Great Forest of Jura. With Veldora gone, there's a chance that the larger nations could become bold and invade the smaller provinces. With no knowledge of this, Rimuru ...

episodes.title: Battle at the Goblin Village
episodes.plot: After leaving the cave, Rimuru encounters a village of Goblins under attack by a clan of Direwolves. Caught in the heat of the moment, Rimuru agrees to help the Goblins in their battle. That night, the Direwolves arrive to try to take over as the new rulers of the Great Forest of Jura.

episodes.title: In the Kingdom of the Dwarves
episodes.plot: Rimuru and his companions visit the Dwarven Kingdom, the Armed Nation of Dwargon, in search of some artisans to help the Goblins learn to supply their own food, shelter, and clothing. However, a skirmish just outside the city gate lands Rimuru and Gobta in a prison cell. Then there's a report of an Armorsaurus in the nearby mines.

episodes.title: Hero King, Gazel Dwargo
episodes.plot: Thanks to Rimuru's skill, Kaijin was able to finish all the longswords and deliver them to the king, so the two of them celebrate by heading to a bar staffed by lots of elf girls. One of them reads Rimuru's fortune for fun, and sees an image in her crystal ball of someone she believes Rimuru is destined to be with. As everyone wonders who this person could be, Vesta shows up and starts to hassle Rimuru.

episodes.title: Shizu
episodes.plot: One day, in the midst of the improvements on the Goblin Village with the help of Kaijin and the dwarves, Rimuru meets a trio of adventurers from the Guild who've been temporarily joined by a masked woman named Shizu. Shizu turns out to be the person Rimuru is destined to be with, as his fortune said. Shizu also came to this world from Japan, but unlike him, she was summoned here many years ago. So Rimuru uses his Thought Communication skill to show Shizu what Japan looks like today.

episodes.title: Conqueror of Flames
episodes.plot: The Demon Lord Leon Cromwell summoned Shizu out of Tokyo as it burned during in the air raids, then forced the high-ranked spirit Ifrit to possess her. After taking over Shizu's body, Ifrit begins to rampage.

episodes.title: Inherited Will
episodes.plot: When Shizu was still with Demon Lord Leon, it was a Hero who rescued her. That Hero was Shizu's inspiration to help as many people as she could for many years. She even worked as a teacher for children who'd come from other worlds. And now, as her time comes to an end, Shizu asks Rimuru for one last favor.

episodes.title: Attack of the Ogres
episodes.plot: Rimuru and the Goblins' village is developing nicely. The Dwarves are building all kinds of houses and furniture, and the local Goblin Lords have appointed Rigurd as the Goblin King. As Rimuru watches everything come together, he decides to return to the cave and test the skills he received from Shizu. While there, he receives a request for help from Ranga through Thought Communication, and he rushes back to find his friends facing six Ogres. One of them orders Rimuru to "reveal his true identity." What is going on in the Great Forest of Jura?

episodes.title: The Orc Lord
episodes.plot: Six Ogres are all that remain of their clan after an attack by an Orc army. They say that the Orcs were traveling with a mysterious majin who wore plate mail and a clown mask. Rimuru proposes that the Ogres join his ranks, and they accept on the condition that they will get to take down the one leading the Orcs, so Rimuru gives all six of them names. Meanwhile, the Orcs begin to invade the marshlands surrounding Lake Siss that are inhabited by the Lizardmen. So the Lizardman chieftan gives his son, Gabiru, an order.

episodes.title: Gabiru Is Here!
episodes.plot: Rimuru's village has gained Benimaru and the other five Ogres as its newest allies. Soon after, the Lizardman Gabiru visits the village, having heard rumors about it. Gabiru has been visiting Goblin villages throughout the Great Forest of Jura to enlist their aid in fighting off the Orc army. When he faces Ranga with an attitude of provocation, Ranga tells him that if he can defeat Gobta, they'll hear what he has to say.

episodes.title: The Gears Spin Out of Control
episodes.plot: The Orc army, led by the Orc Lord, continues its conquest throughout the Great Forest of Jura. The crisis has spurred Treyni of the Dryads, the caretakers of the forest, to take action. She has had her eye on Rimuru after noticing his rise to prominence in the forest, and she wants Rimuru to defeat the Orc Lord.

episodes.title: The Great Clash
episodes.plot: Rimuru and his Goblin riders set out for the marshlands to finalize their alliance with the Lizardmen. On the way, they save a Lizardman who'd been attacked by the Orcs. The victim turns out to be Gabiru's younger sister, who reveals that Gabiru led an insurrection and left to fight the Orc Lord without waiting for the alliance. She also pleads with Rimuru to save Gabiru and the rest of her clan. Meanwhile, Gabiru faces the massive Orc army and is shocked when he witnesses the power of their unique skill, Starved.

episodes.title: The One Who Devours All
episodes.plot: The majin Gelmud makes his appearance at last. His true goal was to evolve the Orc Lord into the Orc Disaster, a Demon Lord, and have him reign over the Forest of Jura. Upon learning this, the Orc Lord takes action.

episodes.title: The Jura Forest Alliance
episodes.plot: Post-war arrangements following the battle with the Orcs have begun. At the meeting, Rimuru reveals that he made a promise with the Orc Disaster, Geld, to take all of the Orcs' sins upon himself. When the Ogres and Lizardmen hear this.

episodes.title: Demon Lord Milim Attacks
episodes.plot: The Jura Tempest Federation, with Rimuru as its leader, has formed an alliance with the Armed Nation of Dwargon. Just as Rimuru thinks there are only peaceful days ahead, he senses an enormous mass of magical power heading straight for his location at an incredible speed. When the smoke from its collision with the ground clears, standing in its place is a humanoid figure. She is the Demon Mord Milim, the one and only Dragonoid and the one bearing the nickname "Destroyer." Ranga, Benimaru, and the others who face her are quickly overwhelmed by her power.

episodes.title: The Gathering
episodes.plot: The Demon Lord Carrion has sent one of his Three Beastketeers, Phobio, on a raid of Rimuru's city. However, Phobio is quickly defeated when Milim meets his attack with her own. Rimuru and his subordinates then ask Phobio why he has come to their town.

episodes.title: Evil Creeps Closer
episodes.plot: Phobio can't restrain his anger toward Milim. He finds himself faced with Footman and Tear, two masked members of the Moderate Harlequin Alliance, who suggest that he become a Demon Lord to take revenge on Milim. They tell him that he can accomplish this using the power of Charybdis. Meanwhile, the Jura Tempest Federation sends Youm out on a journey to make the world believe he was the champion who defeated the Orc Lord.

episodes.title: Charybdis
episodes.plot: Rimuru and his allies begin their battle against the calamity monster Charybdis. Armed with an army of whale monsters, Charybdis proves to be a powerful foe for the Jura Forest Alliance.

episodes.title: Yuuki Kagurazaka
episodes.plot: As the Jura Tempest Alliance celebrates its victory over Charybdis, Rimuru is melancholy over the promise he made to Shizu. As such, he decides to travel to the neighboring kingdom and find the students she used to train.

episodes.title: Shizu-san's Students
episodes.plot: Shizu's students do not have long to live because of the energy used to summon them. Rimuru is determined to save them from their fate and becomes their teacher to train them, much to their chagrin.

episodes.title: Conquering the Labyrinth
episodes.plot: Summoning superior might save the children, so Rimiru enters the Dwelling of Spirits. The Queen of Spirits is amused by Rimuru and decides to put him through a test.

episodes.title: Saved Souls
episodes.plot: In the heart of the labyrinth, Shizu's students pray to summon superior spirits. As Rimuru watches over, an overwhelming presence appears. Will Rimuru finally be able to fulfill his promise to Shizu?

episodes.title: Black and Mask
episodes.plot: Long ago, Shizu is called to the kingdom of Filtwood to stop a revived demon who poses a grave threat to the world. But as the adventurers are briefed, a mysterious being named Black appears who challenges Shizu to a fight.
